import java.util.Scanner;
 
public class Main {
	private static String alpha = "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		try {
			Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
			int tests = sc.nextInt();
			int n,fAlpha=0,pAlpha=0;
			StringBuilder sb = null;
			for(int i=0;i<tests;i++){
				n = sc.nextInt();
				fAlpha = n / 25;
				pAlpha = n%25;
				
				sb = new StringBuilder();
				if(0 != pAlpha)
					sb.append(alpha.substring(26 - pAlpha - 1 ));
				for(int j=0;j<fAlpha;j++){
					sb.append(alpha);
				}
				System.out.println(sb);
				//System.out.println(sb.toString().length());
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}
}
